additionalInformation: For strength heroes, it grants 300 mana and 1.25 mana regen.
For agility heroes, it grants 300 mana and 1.25 mana regen.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 300 mana, 1.25 mana regen and 25 attack damage.
name: Mystic Staff
description: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
